name: Forgetting How to Remember (DEMO)
description:
When a middle aged man gets diagnosed with dementia, life seemingly unfolds as it’s supposed to - a forgetful, inevitable death. However, the consequences of his choices begin to weigh heavier than before. What he chooses affects not only him but his wife, daughter, and establishes the course of his ultimate demise.

Credits:

Game created by Maaz.

Written by Shrishti.

Concept by Maaz and Naji.

This version of Forgetting How to Remember is only a demo.
